A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie seemed designed to kill off everything beloved in Star Wars.  From its opening scroll when you are casually told that everything your heroes fought for for the last 4 movies counted for nothing and now the Rebellion is a few hundred fugitives on a handful of ships to the flippant dismissal of any every Star Wars sacred cow - I felt like the movie's creators hated Star Wars and wanted it dead.  Over and over in the movie we are told you must \"kill the past\" - it seems that was the directors goal\, and he succeeded.  The Star Wars franchise is dead to me now.
